divs: Sighting DetailsIt was Sept 15, 2009 at 12:30 AM when I came out on my balcony for a smoke and noticed a bright white light to the north north east probably about 5 miles or so away. Raalizing it was out of the ordinary I went inside to get my cell phone to take a picture. When I took the 1st picture it dimmed a little. I then went to take the 2nd picture and it zoomed off to the east and went out of sight. I live near the municipal airport but have never seen an airplane or helicopter like this or do what this one did. I did not see any blinking colored lights like I normally see on aircraft. I told a friend at work and he suggested I report this to MUFON. I was unable to download the pics from my phone but will have them later if needed. Thank you.
trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Casa Grande
There were no other sightings in Casa Grande on or around September 15th 2009
Summary: Bright star like light to the north stationarly several min then took off to the east.
